00011 MCRawWriter::MCRawWriter() : 
00012   BaseModule(MCRawWriter::GetDefaultName(),
00013              "Saves the (gzip'ped) raw data from the digitizers to disk"), 
00014   _fout(), _ok(true), _bytes_written(0)
00015 {
00016   _filename = GetDefaultFilename();
00017   RegisterParameter("filename",_filename,
00018                     "Name of the output file; if it doesn't contain a /, assumed relative to <directory>");
00019   RegisterParameter("directory",_directory=".", 
00020                     "Directory in which to place the output file");
00021   RegisterParameter("compression", _compression = Z_BEST_SPEED,
00022                     "zip compression level of the event structures");
00023   RegisterParameter("save_config", _save_config = true,
00024                     "Do we save the configuration along with the data?");
00025   RegisterParameter("max_file_size", _max_file_size = 0x80000000, //2 GiB
00026                     "Maximum file size before making a new file");
00027   RegisterParameter("max_event_in_file", _max_event_in_file = 1000, 
00028                     "Maximum number of events before making a new file");
00029 
00030   ConfigHandler* config = ConfigHandler::GetInstance();
00031   config->AddCommandSwitch('f',"filename", "File for saving raw data",
00032                            CommandSwitch::DefaultRead<std::string>(_filename),
00033                            "file");
00034   config->AddCommandSwitch('d',"directory","Output directory for raw file",
00035                            CommandSwitch::DefaultRead<std::string>(_directory),
00036                            "directory");
00037   config->AddCommandSwitch('c',"compression","Raw data compression level",
00038                            CommandSwitch::DefaultRead<int>(_compression),
00039                            "level");
00040 }

00042 MCRawWriter::~MCRawWriter()
00043 {
00044   if(_fout.is_open())
00045     CloseCurrentFile();
00046 }

00048 std::string MCRawWriter::GetDefaultFilename() const
00049 {
00050   //create the default filename
00051   time_t rawtime;
00052   time(&rawtime);
00053   struct tm *timeinfo;
00054   timeinfo = localtime(&rawtime);
00055   char fbuf[40];
00056   strftime(fbuf,40,"rawdaq_%y%m%d_%H%M.out",timeinfo);
00057   return fbuf;
00058   
00059 }

00061 int MCRawWriter::Initialize()
00062 {
00063   //see if we need to prepend the directory
00064   if( _filename.find("/") ==std::string::npos && _directory != ""){
00065     std::string temp = _directory;
00066     if(temp[temp.size()-1] != '/')
00067       temp.append("/");
00068     temp.append(_filename);
00069     _filename=temp;
00070   }
00071   //see if we need to remove the .out suffix
00072   if( _filename.rfind(".out") != std::string::npos)
00073     _filename.resize(_filename.size()-4);
00074   //set the run id
00075   // _ghead.run_id = EventHandler::GetInstance()->GetRunID();
00076   _mchead.run_id = 0;  // set via SetRunID()
00077   //set the file index
00078   _mchead.file_index = 0;
00079   //write the partial config file
00080   // if(_save_config)
00081   //   SaveConfigFile();
00082   return OpenNewFile();
00083 }
00084 
00085 int MCRawWriter::Process(MCEventPtr event)
00086 {
00087   if(!_ok){
00088     Message(ERROR)<<"Attempt to write to file in bad state!\n";
00089     return 1;
00090   }
00091   
00092   typedef Reader::datablock_header datablock_header;
00093   //compress all of the datablocks into a separate buffer
00094   //each block has compressed size, including header, uncompressed data size, 
00095   //and type as header
00096   //determine the total size of the output buffer
00097   uint32_t bufsize = sizeof(Reader::event_header);
00098   for(size_t i = 0; i<event->GetRawEvent()->GetNumDataBlocks(); i++){
00099     bufsize += compressBound(event->GetRawEvent()->GetDataBlockSize(i)) + 
00100       sizeof(datablock_header);
00101   }
00102   //zip the data into the buffer
00103   std::vector<char> buf(bufsize);
00104   size_t zipsize=sizeof(Reader::event_header);
00105   for(size_t i = 0;i<event->GetRawEvent()->GetNumDataBlocks(); i++){
00106     //write the data into a space after the header
00107     uLong thistransfer = bufsize-zipsize-sizeof(datablock_header);
00108     int err = 0;
00109     if(_compression == Z_DEFAULT_COMPRESSION){
00110       err = compress((Bytef*)(&buf[zipsize+sizeof(datablock_header)]),
00111                      &thistransfer,
00112                      event->GetRawEvent()->GetRawDataBlock(i),
00113                      event->GetRawEvent()->GetDataBlockSize(i));
00114     }
00115     else{
00116       err = compress2((Bytef*)(&buf[zipsize+sizeof(datablock_header)]),
00117                       &thistransfer,
00118                       event->GetRawEvent()->GetRawDataBlock(i),
00119                       event->GetRawEvent()->GetDataBlockSize(i),
00120                       _compression);
00121     }
00122     if(err != Z_OK){
00123       Message(ERROR)<<"Unable to compress event datablocks in memory\n";
00124       return -1;
00125     }
00126     //write the header
00127     datablock_header* db_head = (datablock_header*)(&buf[zipsize]);
00128     db_head->total_blocksize_disk = sizeof(datablock_header)+thistransfer;
00129     db_head->datasize = event->GetRawEvent()->GetDataBlockSize(i);
00130     db_head->type = event->GetRawEvent()->GetDataBlockType(i);
00131     zipsize += db_head->total_blocksize_disk;
00132     
00133   }
00134   //set values in the event header
00135   Reader::event_header* ehead = (Reader::event_header*)(&buf[0]);
00136   ehead->event_size = zipsize;
00137   ehead->event_id = event->GetRawEvent()->GetID();
00138   ehead->timestamp = event->GetRawEvent()->GetTimestamp();
00139   ehead->nblocks = event->GetRawEvent()->GetNumDataBlocks();
00140 
00141   //see if we need to make a new file
00142   if(_mchead.nevents>=(uint32_t)_max_event_in_file || 
00143      _mchead.file_size + ehead->event_size > _max_file_size){
00144     //  if(((ehead->event_id+1) % _max_event_in_file == 0) || _mchead.file_size + ehead->event_size > _max_file_size){
00145     if( CloseCurrentFile() || OpenNewFile() ){
00146       Message(ERROR)<<"Error occurred when trying to open new file!\n";
00147       return 1;
00148     }
00149   }
00150   
00151   //actually write the event
00152   if(!_fout.write((const char*)(&buf[0]), zipsize)){
00153     Message(ERROR)<<"Error occurred when writing event "<<ehead->event_id
00154                   <<"to disk!\n";
00155     return -1;
00156   }
00157   _bytes_written += ehead->event_size;
00158   //update info for global header
00159   _mchead.nevents++;
00160   if(_mchead.event_id_min > ehead->event_id)
00161     _mchead.event_id_min = ehead->event_id;
00162   _mchead.event_id_max = ehead->event_id;
00163   _mchead.file_size += ehead->event_size;
00164   return 0;
00165 }
00166 
00167 int MCRawWriter::Finalize()
00168 {
00169   if(_fout.is_open()){
00170     CloseCurrentFile();
00171     Message(INFO)<<_bytes_written/1024/1024<<" MiB saved to "<<_filename<<"\n";
00172     if(_bytes_written==0){
00173       //Message(WARNING)<<"0 bytes saved; deleting file."<<std::endl;
00174       //char command[40];
00175       //sprintf(command,"rm -f %s",_filename.c_str());
00176       //int result = system(command);
00177       //if(result)
00178       //Message(ERROR)<<"Unable to delete file!\n";
00179     }
00180   }
00181   if(_save_config && _bytes_written > 0){
00182     SaveConfigFile();
00183   }
00184   return 0;
00185 }
00186 
00187 
00188 int MCRawWriter::OpenNewFile()
00189 {
00190   if(_fout.is_open()){
00191     Message(WARNING)<<"Tried to open new file while current file still open!\n";
00192     CloseCurrentFile();
00193   }
00194   
00195   //set the filename to filename.###.out, where ### is file_index
00196   std::stringstream fname;
00197   fname<<_filename<<"."<<std::setw(3)<<std::setfill('0')
00198        <<_mchead.file_index<<".out";
00199   Message(INFO)<<"Opening file "<<fname.str()<<std::endl;
00200   _fout.open(fname.str().c_str(), std::ios::out|std::ios::binary);
00201   if(!_fout.is_open()){
00202     Message(ERROR)<<"Unable to open file "<<fname.str()<<" for output!\n";
00203     _ok = false;
00204     return 1;
00205   }
00206   //write the "blank" global header 
00207   _mchead.start_time = time(0);
00208   //reset nevents
00209   _mchead.nevents = 0;
00210   //set min event id to max value so we can set it properly during Process
00211   _mchead.event_id_min = 0xFFFFFFFF;
00212   //reset the file_size 
00213   _mchead.file_size = _mchead.global_header_size;
00214   
00215   _fout.write((const char*)(&_mchead), _mchead.global_header_size);
00216   
00217   return 0;
00218 }
00219 
00220 int MCRawWriter::CloseCurrentFile()
00221 {
00222   if(!_fout.is_open())
00223     return 0;
00224   //save the completed global header
00225   _mchead.end_time = time(0);
00226   _fout.seekp(0);
00227   _fout.write((const char*)(&_mchead), _mchead.global_header_size);
00228   _fout.close();
00229   //increment the file_index counter
00230   _mchead.file_index++;
00231   return 0;
00232 }
00233 
00234 void MCRawWriter::SaveConfigFile()
00235 {
00236   //strip the '.gz' off the end of the file
00237   std::string cfgfile(_filename);
00238   if(_filename.rfind(".gz") != std::string::npos)
00239     cfgfile.resize(cfgfile.size()-3);
00240   //strip off .out
00241   if(_filename.rfind(".out") != std::string::npos)
00242     cfgfile.resize(cfgfile.size()-4);
00243   _mcinfo.SaveToFile((cfgfile+".cfg").c_str());
00244   
00245 }
